parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: LiveStreamType
parameters.description: Specifies whether the live stream is ingested by a streamer or played by a client. Set the value to **publisher**.

parameters.name: Oneshot
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to disable the ingest without adding the ingest URL of the live stream to the blacklist. Valid values:

*   **yes**: Disable the ingest but do not add the ingest URL of the live stream to the blacklist. This value is available only when the live stream is ingested or played in the upstream.
*   **no**: Disable the ingest and add the ingest URL of the live stream to the blacklist.

>  Default value: **no**.

parameters.name: ResumeTime
parameters.description:
The time when the ingest can be enabled for the live stream. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.


**Important**

If the **Oneshot** parameter is set to **no**, you can permanently disable the ingest of the live stream by leaving the ResumeTime parameter empty.

If you specify a value for the ResumeTime parameter, the ingest URL is removed from the blacklist at the specified time and the ingest is enabled for the live stream.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream for which you want to disable the ingest.
